answers.answer: I'm sorry. Even though I don't know you I wilk keep you in my thoughts. :-(

That is bs that she didn't tell you right away.. all it takes is a freaking phone call... I would be super upset also.. I found out the results the day I did the test so that is no reason on her part.. is there any way you can call the ob department and have them authorize a script
Yea that's what I have to do. Just they aren't good at getting back to me all the time, its frustrating. Yea it is bs, super big bs.

question: I just found out at 32 weeks I have gestational diabetes, and my doc wants me to avoid sex bc it was making me contract so bad. So I have to be on a diet and no sex. This is literally my own personal hell. I'm so moopy and depressed and wishy washy. One day I'm sad about all of this, one day I'm positive. This is just so hard for me to deal with to bedisaplined with food, and my doc doesn't seem to be doing her job. She tells me at 32 weeks, not 28. About my test results. And then claims she was behind and that's why she didn't tell me. Then I find out today that they were suppossed to give me a prescription for the tester and strips, did she? No she didn't. So now I have to wait. This is ridiculous, I want to change doctors but it feels to late in the game to do that. I'm frustrated though with that and struggling with all these changes. Ug. Thanks for listening.
title: :( vent
